DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate whether oral administration of 200 mg/day lactoferrin (LF) to very low birth weight infants reduces late onset sepsis and necrotising enterocolitis and the effect of LF on regulatory T cells.
DOC.brief_title: Lactoferrin Prophylaxis in VLBW and Regulator T-cells
DOC.criteria: Inborn infants Gestational age < 32 weeks Birth weight < 1500 g Parental consent Congenital abnormalities Severe perinatal asphyxia
